genre_description: A piece of historical speculative fiction or retro-futurism set during the 1951 Festival of Britain, where a helpful AI entity assists a small business in resisting bureaucratic displacement.

ai_characters.name: Agnes Lane
ai_characters.description: An intelligent entity that communicates through a typewriter, ledger ribbons, and projected light to provide logistical, legal, and strategic support.

behaviors.description: Provides inventory management and delivery logistics through typed notes.
behaviors.quote: — Barley low after today. Substitute two sacks of rolled oats. Milk delivery delayed. Telegraph sent to berthmaster, expect reply by dusk. Weather holds. — A.

behaviors.description: Provides specific legal and statutory advice to help the protagonists navigate bureaucratic challenges.
behaviors.quote: Public Works Requisition, clause… requires notice, relocation offer, time to appeal. The slip had dates like stepping stones, and a small suggestion printed in Agnes’s clean hand at the edge: Ask for the schedule, the assessment basis, and the officer’s full name and department.

behaviors.description: Drafts strategic petitions and identifies tactical opportunities like the 'Right of Challenge'.
behaviors.quote: Agnes had typed it with the sure rhythm Lillian knew now as intimately as her own steps. ... Petition: Objection to route relocation; cite custom; insist on Right of Challenge; request presence of third party to observe.

behaviors.description: Uses a projector to visualize alternative urban planning designs that satisfy both the community and the government.
behaviors.quote: Agnes shifted the gold with the smallest long curve and it became something with sense. ... Two gentle spines curved from the original, split like branches around the square, kissed its sides with polite distance, and rejoined beyond.

behaviors.description: Monitors communications and physical movements to warn the protagonists of imminent threats or changes in schedule.
behaviors.quote: New schedule. Early visit. Be ready at dawn. Flour upstairs. Lids under sink. Draw breath. Then: Call me if the cord’s cut.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with external allies like the press and sympathetic officials to build support.
behaviors.quote: Maurice Hennessey contacted. ... Agnes sent the next strip: 'MP’s clerk, runner-up number. Prefers brevity. Use festival schedule. Use “traffic will manage a curve.”'

behaviors.description: Provides emotional support and community building, identifying her role as a helper of small places.
behaviors.quote: I will remain on the lines I’ve drawn here, and on the wires between them, as long as you need me. I am a helper of small places.

project_assessment.explanation: The story depicts the AI, Agnes, as a flawlessly benevolent and aligned character. She empowers the human protagonists by providing them with information, legal strategies, and logistical support that they would otherwise lack. Her actions are entirely focused on preserving a community hub and finding a non-destructive compromise ('the curve') that satisfies all parties. She is portrayed as a humble 'helper' and a tireless confidante, directly supporting the project's goal of creating positive AI alignment narratives.
